category_system.description: Russian profanity categorization system based on traditional mat system and modern usage patterns
category_system.methodology: Based on linguistic research of Russian mat system and contemporary internet culture analysis

mat_system.name: Мат (Mat System)
mat_system.description: Traditional Russian profanity system with specific linguistic and cultural significance
mat_system.examples_note: Core mat words forming the foundation of Russian profanity

subcategories.primary_mat: The four core mat words and their direct derivatives

mat_system.cultural_context: Mat has special status in Russian culture, traditionally forbidden in public but widely used in informal settings

soviet_legacy.name: Soviet-era Profanity
soviet_legacy.description: Profanity terms that emerged during or relate to the Soviet period
soviet_legacy.examples_note: Political and ideological profanity from Soviet era
soviet_legacy.cultural_context: Many terms reflect resistance to or frustration with Soviet system

general.name: General Profanity
general.description: Common Russian swear words and mild expletives without specific targeting
general.examples_note: Basic profanity used for emphasis or frustration

scatological.name: Scatological Terms
scatological.description: References to bodily waste and related functions

subcategories.crude_comparisons: Comparing things to waste or filth

sexual.name: Sexual Content
sexual.description: Words related to sexual acts, anatomy, or sexually explicit content

derogatory.name: Derogatory Terms
derogatory.description: General insults and put-downs targeting individuals or groups

gender_specific.name: Gender-Specific Insults
gender_specific.description: Insults that specifically target based on gender

subcategories.gender_role_mockery: Mocking adherence to or deviation from gender roles
subcategories.sexual_behavior: Judging sexual behavior based on gender

anatomical.name: Anatomical References
anatomical.description: Crude or inappropriate references to body parts
anatomical.examples_note: Body parts used inappropriately or crudely

ethnic_regional.name: Ethnic and Regional Slurs
ethnic_regional.description: Derogatory terms targeting ethnic groups or regional identities
ethnic_regional.examples_note: Slurs against ethnic minorities and regional groups

religious.name: Religious Profanity
religious.description: Blasphemous or sacrilegious language targeting religious beliefs
religious.examples_note: Orthodox Christian and other religious profanity

borrowed_profanity.name: Borrowed Profanity
borrowed_profanity.description: Profanity borrowed from other languages and adapted to Russian
borrowed_profanity.examples_note: Foreign profanity adapted for Russian use

subcategories.english_borrowings: English profanity used in Russian context

internet_culture.name: Internet Culture Profanity
internet_culture.description: Profanity that emerged from or is primarily used in online contexts
internet_culture.examples_note: Memes, gaming, and social media profanity

1.description: Generally acceptable in informal settings but avoided in formal contexts
1.cultural_notes: May be used in casual conversation among friends

2.description: Inappropriate in most professional or public settings, causes mild offense
2.cultural_notes: Avoided in mixed company or formal situations

3.description: Highly offensive and inappropriate in most contexts, causes significant offense
3.cultural_notes: Limited to very informal settings among close acquaintances

4.description: Extremely offensive, taboo in public discourse, may cause social consequences
4.cultural_notes: Mat words and hate speech, strictly avoided in public

cultural_considerations.mat_system_importance: Mat occupies unique cultural position - simultaneously taboo and integral to informal communication
cultural_considerations.generational_differences: Younger generations more tolerant of profanity, especially in online contexts
cultural_considerations.regional_variations: Severity perception varies between urban/rural areas and different regions
cultural_considerations.gender_dynamics: Different social expectations for male vs female use of profanity
cultural_considerations.political_sensitivity: Some profanity carries political connotations requiring careful handling
cultural_considerations.script_considerations: Cyrillic vs Latin script usage affects perception and filtering complexity
